text: 🚨🚨🚨 On the same day it comes out that Donald Trump is "not really working [on coronavirus] anymore" and "doesn’t want to be distracted by it," we learn the White House is blocking funding for testing, contact tracing, and the CDC. What the hell? https://t.co/yzSMhv42Y4
